    • Method Detail

      • getGamesCount

        public int getGamesCount()
                  throws QueryException
        We read the number of games directly from the index. As we have one document per game, this means that we simply return the number of documents contained in the index.
        Specified by:
        getGamesCount in interface IndexInfoService
        Returns:
        The number of games contained in the index.
        Throws:
        QueryException - When the index is unreachable or does not exist.
